categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic
Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Lesina  was a  Human female Jedi Master stationed on Taris during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. While on Taris she taught synthweaving to Republic individuals.
Lesina appears only in the game files for Star Wars: The Old Republic as her character was cut from the game. Lesina's file can be found on Jedipedia.
